## Installation

First, you need to install the package from the .tar.gz file

``` r
install.packages("~/path/activity.tar.gz", repos = NULL, type = "source")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to launch your app:


```{r,eval =F}

library(activity)
## basic example code
activity::run_app()
```
